Module Contents¶

users.views.User¶
class users.views.UsersViewSet(**kwargs)¶

Bases: rest_framework.viewsets.ViewSet

A ViewSet for managing user-related actions such as login, logout, listing users, deleting users, and managing user groups. Provides endpoints for handling user authentication and group management.
